amendment.description: To limit the availability of funds for the support of Ukraine.

vote.text: Amendment SA 376 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 13 - 71. Record Vote Number: 195.

action.text: Amendment SA 376 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3448-3449) To limit the availability of funds for the support of Ukraine.
